title: Google Launches Machine Unlearning Competition to Enhance Data Privacy Rights
description: In a bold move to safeguard data privacy rights, Google has announced an upcoming machine “unlearning” competition. The initiative aims to develop algorithms that selectively erase sensitive data from AI systems, ensuring compliance with global data regulation standards. This groundbreaking contest, open to all participants, is set to run from mid-July to mid-September. The significance ... Read more
